feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 p.m. NDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 7:30 PM NDT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: E 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 1 May 2023
